page.title: 12HOME LIFE
page.content:
EXCERPTS FROM "MY DAD"
"Dad has to get up at 7 a.m. to fetch the cows up from the field. It takes him 2 hrs to milk all the cows. Sometimes Dad goes to Uttoxeter market and buys or sells cows or calves. Dad likes most food but only English food. His favourite sweet is Fruit & Nut. My dad sometimes takes the boys football and he also plays cricket at Sutton-on-the-Hill" "My dad is 41 years old and his hobbies are running, motor cycles (he has a Vincent in the garage). He works at Rolls-Royce on the broken machines. Mum & Dad took us to Alton Towers & we went on the Log Flume, dad got saturated" "Daddy is a Carpenter and has a big appetite. He likes rock buns and chocolate cake and likes to be tickled
